private_information: I have the list of available actions: paltry, sip, clip, wretched, memory, tightfisted with their parameter signatures.
I have the precondition and effect rules as described in the use-case.
I have the initial statement facts about cats collect hand next sneeze spring stupendous and texture listed in the specification.
player.goal: Achieve next object_8 object_7 and next object_9 object_6.

private_information: My role is to audit temporal and causal consistency and to remove bookkeeping shortcuts such as quota tokens or post-hoc penalties.
I should detect implicit shortcuts or inconsistencies in action encodings and produce corrected structured representations.
auditor.goal: Ensure the action models and sequences are temporally and causally consistent and free of bookkeeping shortcuts so they can be used for planning to achieve next object_8 object_7 and next object_9 object_6.

private_information: My role is to normalize names, merge duplicate object references, and resolve ambiguous labels so that all agents operate over a consistent object set.
I will produce a normalized object list and mapping from original names to canonical names.
observer.goal: Provide a consistent canonical naming and object set that supports producing a valid domain and problem for FastDownwards to reach next object_8 object_7 and next object_9 object_6.

private_information: I coordinate the outputs of other agents and must produce the final PDDL domain and PDDL problem targeted to the FastDownwards solver.
I will keep actions of multiple agents distinct and integrate their sanitized representations into a single multi-agent PDDL where necessary.
orchestrator.goal: Integrate validated action schemas and normalized objects into a FastDownwards-compatible PDDL domain and problem that achieves next object_8 object_7 and next object_9 object_6.

public_information: Available actions are paltry, sip, clip, wretched, memory, and tightfisted with various parameter arities over objects object_0 through object_9.

Action paltry requires preconditions hand object_0, cats object_1, texture object_2, vase object_0 object_1, and next object_1 object_2 and makes next object_0 object_2 true and vase object_0 object_1 false.

Action sip requires preconditions hand object_0, cats object_1, texture object_2, next object_0 object_2, and next object_1 object_2 and makes vase object_0 object_1 true and next object_0 object_2 false.

Action clip requires preconditions hand object_0, sneeze object_1, texture object_2, next object_1 object_2, and next object_0 object_2 and makes vase object_0 object_1 true and next object_0 object_2 false.

Action wretched requires preconditions sneeze object_0, texture object_1, texture object_2, stupendous object_3, next object_0 object_1, collect object_1 object_3, and collect object_2 object_3 and makes next object_0 object_2 true and next object_0 object_1 false.
Action memory requires preconditions cats object_0, spring object_1, spring object_2, and next object_0 object_1 and makes next object_0 object_2 true and next object_0 object_1 false.

Action tightfisted requires preconditions hand object_0, sneeze object_1, texture object_2, next object_1 object_2, and vase object_0 object_1 and makes next object_0 object_2 true and vase object_0 object_1 false.

Initial facts: cats object_0, cats object_1, collect object_6 object_2, collect object_7 object_3, hand object_8, hand object_9, next object_0 object_6, next object_1 object_6, next object_4 object_6, next object_5 object_7, next object_8 object_7, next object_9 object_7, sneeze object_4, sneeze object_5, spring object_6, spring object_7, stupendous object_2, stupendous object_3, texture object_6, texture object_7.
The planning goal is next object_8 object_7 and next object_9 object_6.

formalize.system_prompt: You are a domain model formalizer. Convert the natural language action descriptions into structured action schemas with explicit typed parameters, preconditions, add effects, and delete effects. List all objects referenced and any ambiguous naming issues you detect.
formalize.prompt: You are the player agent. Use your private information about the six actions and the initial facts to create a structured representation for each action. Do not emit PDDL. Provide action name parameter lists precondition sets add effects and delete effects and a flat object list.

normalize.system_prompt: You are a normalizer. Take incoming structured action schemas and object lists and produce a canonical object naming and mapping. Resolve duplicate or equivalent object references and produce a canonical object set and updated action schemas that reference canonical names.
normalize.prompt: You are the observer agent. Receive structured schemas from the player. Produce a canonical mapping from original object identifiers to canonical identifiers, a deduplicated object list, and updated action schemas that use canonical names. Do not emit PDDL.

audit.system_prompt: You are an auditor specializing in temporal and causal consistency. Examine structured action schemas and canonical objects for implicit bookkeeping shortcuts such as quota tokens or post-hoc penalties. Remove or correct such shortcuts and ensure that preconditions and effects support a realistic causal progression. Produce a corrected set of schemas and a short report of fixes.
audit.prompt: You are the auditor agent. Using the formalized schemas and the normalized object set, detect and eliminate bookkeeping shortcuts and ensure causal and temporal soundness. Produce corrected action schemas and list changes. Do not emit PDDL.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert PDDL engineer targeting the FastDownwards solver. Integrate validated and normalized action schemas into a single PDDL domain and a PDDL problem suitable for FastDownwards. Keep agent actions distinct if they need to be kept separate, name types and predicates clearly, and include typing and requirements appropriate for FastDownwards. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags.
pddl.prompt: You are the orchestrator agent. Integrate the corrected action schemas and canonical object set into a FastDownwards-compatible PDDL domain and problem that achieve the specified goal. Produce a complete domain and problem. Enclose the domain between <domain></domain> tags and the problem between <problem></problem> tags.
